Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Lovely little cafe with equally lovely espresso. Really liked it. A good combination with a slice of cake and a good outside view. Could have also sat outside to enjoy the weather if it were not for the terrible weather.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Small but perfect atmosphere. Nice staff. Great coffee!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: This is a nice and cozy place to grab a coffee and stay for a short while. It is a good place to get a quick breakfast before heading out to the shopping area nearby. The coffee was good, but not amazing (but better than many places in Amsterdam). There's also an outside seating area which is nice when the weather is good.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Very good coffee, tasty treats and super friendly staff. A place that makes you feel like a regular even when you walk in for the first time!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Delicious coffee, nice baristas, decent prices, and great latte art- what more could you want??

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: The caramel cappuccino is delectable and the baristas are super nice and friendly, very helpful, and made this lone Canadian feel very welcome. As a bonus, they're located right by a couple of really great bookstores and lovely views around the back of the shop of the Singel Canal.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: On of the best places to get coffee in Amsterdam. The staff is always very welcoming and they are very professional and passionate about their coffee! Might be a little bit expensive but I'd rather pay something extra for a nice good coffee!!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Top destination for a good iced latte with oat milk. Tell them to make it strong and you will have a beautiful taste on a hot summer day. No dairy and super good for the mood üòç‚úåüèº

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Very very Poor service! I had been to this coffee company recently, Place was very untidy and  dirty, and some sort of Bad smell as soon as you enter . And the service is very bad, the staff has negative Attitude towards the Costomer! I‚Äôm ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee, outdoor tables and relaxed vibe!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: One of the best black coffees on the go, near the √Åmsterdam Museum and a library in a cultural spot. The taste is really incredible. Being colombian, as I am, felt a bit confused. I had a deja-v√∫ effect, feeling to have a splendid cup of coffee in Bogot√° city. Nothing less, nothing more to add.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text:
Very kind and nice staffs. Needless to mention about coffee. It's great. Highly recommended.
(And many thanks to staffs for nice coffee :-))

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Very nice and cozy place to grab a coffee! ‚òï

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great service at this coffee company! Amy, the barista, made the best coffee I have ever had! Will definitely be back!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Such a lovely coffee shop and lovely two ladies working there with their lovely dog. Had a great time. Would love to visit them again.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: No tables inside, a little small but they have a very good space outside. Good teas and smoothies. Nice view to the avenue

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Perfect for grabbing a coffee on the go. Excellent coffee with friendly staff. Don't expect to sit and relax though.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great coffee, kind staff and really nice calm and cosy atmosphere in vibey bustling street :)

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: While I do appreciate the soy and almond milk options, the almond milk in the cappuccino I had had started to separate, so maybe don't take that almond milk :/

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Of course they have various coffees, but also reasonable priced small breakfast

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Excellent service at this location. Good coffee, small space. Seating inside and outside

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great Coffee, I can definitely recommend you visit this place!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Don't miss this place if you're a coffee lover

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice to hang out, but a bit small. Friendly service and very good coffee!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Delicious coffee and friendly staff!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Tiny place, but convenient location next to the square. You can buy stamp cards here, but they do not really save money - they just save some time.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Lovely coffee

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Their coffee is great and the seating area outside is so good.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Very cramped and pretty average service and food/drink quality. Nice enough for a quick Pitt stop whilst exploring

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great spot to watch the hustle and bustle drive by in the form of trams and bikes, always something happening lol

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Had a very nice cappuccino from here, the location is really nice to sit outside.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great service and they have almond and coconut milk!! Thanks for the milk alternatives!! No just soy milk xp

Name: Coffee Company
